DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine cryopreservation blastocyst stage follow embryo thaw transfer effective cryopreservation bipronuclear oocytes follow post-thaw extended culture ( PTEC ) , blastocyst transfer . Effectiveness measured rate ongoing pregnancy 10 week gestation .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Transfers Thawed Blastocysts Versus Blastocysts Derived From Thawed Bipronuclear Oocytes
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects randomize one two study group cycle vitro fertilization ( IVF ) . In one group , subject embryos cryopreserved blastocyst stage , follow thaw transfer subsequent cycle . In group , subject embryos cryopreserved bipronuclear oocyte stage , follow thaw , extended culture , transfer subsequent cycle .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Female patient seek autologous vitro fertilization ( IVF ) treatment . 2 . Cycle day 3 serum concentration follicle stimulate hormone ( FSH ) less 10.0 IU/l . 3 . Baseline total antral follicle count observe ultrasound least eight antral follicle . 4 . 18 40 year age . 5 . Ability read understand English . 1 . Embryo biopsy ( a.k.a . preimplantation genetic diagnosis ( PGD ) ) . 2 . Any condition , opinion physician principal investigator , would place patient undue risk protocol would otherwise make protocol inappropriate subject . 3 . No minor enrol study .
